scenario.name: INFO out-of-dialog
scenario.send:
INFO sip:[service]@[remote_ip]:[remote_port] SIP/2.0 Via: SIP/2.0/[transport] [local_ip]:[local_port];branch=[branch] Max-Forwards: 70 From: <sip:sipp@[local_ip]>;tag=[call_number] To: <sip:[service]@[remote_ip]> Call-ID: [call_id] CSeq: 1 INFO Content-Type: application/dtmf-relay Content-Length: [len]
Signal=1 Duration=160
